name: National Growth Funding
overview: National Growth Funding offers a comprehensive and collaborative approach to creating a more competitive company. A comprehensive approach addresses the business, employees, and the business environment together instead of isolating and treating a symptomatic problem you may be encountering. The collaborative aspect means including and working with our clientâ€™s personnel at all levels. This leverages internal experts and facilitates knowledge transfer of skills to the client for use after the project is complete. Small business owners looking to build their credit and improve their funding options can now turn to National Growth Funding Inc. for help. National Growth Funding will help small businesses establish relationships with vendors and lenders, will set up a profile with the credit reporting company Dun & Bradstreet, and will help find new business accounts.
